title: Thomson 9A Series 108 cm (43 inch) Full HD LED Smart Android TV with Bezel Less Display  (43PATH0009 BL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 TV Unit, Remote, 2 AAA Batteries, Wallmount, Manual
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MP4, MPEG, MPG, MKV, AVI, FLV, ASF
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, Music, News, Movie, Game, User
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MP3, MPEG1/2/2.5, AAC, HEAAC, ASF, WMA
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Google Assistant Enabled Remote, Control Smart Home, Routines, Get Answers, Manage Tasks, HotKeys (Prime, YouTube, Sony Liv)
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product & 6 Months on Accessories
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: The Product is Not Used According to Instructions given in the Instruction Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature is Made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Installation or Repair Work is Carried Out by Persons or Agency Other than Authorized by the Company. Site (Premises Where the Product is Kept) Conditions that do not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. Original Serial Number is Removed, Obliterated or Altered from the Machine or Cabinet. Defects due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightning, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to Service Centre or Purchaser's Residence. The Warranty does not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag Etc). Dust appearing on television panel after 10 days of usage, mentioned in the Operating Instruction Manual Supplied with this Product or Any Cosmetic Parts
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Impressive Display: If you have an HD set-top box at home, then this Thomson TV is the right home entertainment appliance for you. The high-quality display offers an impressive depth, natural colours, and also stunning textures for an immersive viewing experience.
product_description.Android 9.0: The user-friendly interface of the Android 9.0 OS lets you experience artificial intelligence and a customised interface on this smart TV.

First of all the reviews were given positive impression to buy this.
* Very impressive TV on the price. Picture clarity is very superb. played 4K 60fps video with MX player, its playing very smoothly and clearly. It looks like a 4k TV. Every colours are looks clear and sharp.
* It has dual band WiFi support (but dont know to switch the bands), for that reason I bought this. we need to feed high resolution videos to enjoy the colours.
*Almost the manufacturer covered all latest connectivity options like hdmi arc, usb, optical output, spdif.

*But totally disappointed with TV speakers. With high sound the panel getting viberated and gives bad noise like failure speaker sound. But it's not a problem for sound bar and home theatre system users.
*But great disappointment is no dolby atmos sound

This is good TV this price range and I pretty happy with Jeeves service, second day TV installed by the service center team. Now if we go with Picture Quality is pretty good, I have a Samsung TV and comparing them, both are producing almost same picture quality, I did not find any major difference, Very little difference difficult to Identify with naked eyes.
If I talked about the sound quality, it is good, but not as compare to MI and Realme, I found Bass is low in this TV, but as per the overall performance it is nice TV to have in this price range, you can go this TV without ay doubt.

The smart TV is upto the mark and well appreciable in the range with its sound, picture quality and screen dimensions. The ease of connection further leverages the American brand wrt other companies. I suggest to buy it in this price range of 20k. Best wishes.

Thanks flipkart and thomson

This led smart tv is a very good option if you're on a budget. The ips display panel is bright and viewing angles are great. With 3 hdmi and 2 usb ports, the connectivity options should suffice for most people. I have faced no lags or crashes with the in built android tv. Youtube, Prime, Hotstar etc all work fine. Overall, I'm satisfied with the performance of this tv. Hopefully it'll provide years of trouble free performance.

Received Thomson 42 inch LED TV on 17th Feb 2021 and got installed on same day. TV is good with nice picture quality and sound quality. Good connectivity and mostly the YouTube videos played smooth and better picture quality than DTH HD connection. Sound is enough of 30W speakers. No need of external speakers. Will post more updates in coming days. Hope this will be helpful for others.

DON'T BUT THIS....... IT'S A BIG TRAP
Earlier when I purchased this TV in Aug 2021, I rated it with 5 stars. But within four months of using it, the smart remote started to malfunction which eventually made the TV Non Operational. Majority of the buttons in the remote didn't respond. I replaced the batteries with the new ones but still nothing improved. Finally I contacted Thomson Customer Care (which is all the more hard to reach). Instead of replacing the faulty remote, they suggested me other irrelevant measures like replacing the batteries, downloading a remote control app on the mobile phone etc etc, which eventually failed. Now they're asking me to courier the faulty remote (Courier Charges have to be born by me).
Additionally, don't buy the COMPLETE PROTECTION PLAN (which is a subsidiary of Flipcart) for any of the device because when you ask for a claim or repair or replacement, they will trap you in one or the other TERMS AND CONDITIONS like remote, plastic, rubber, fuses is not covered, accessories not covered. They will say that you have handled it irresponsibly, fair wear and tear etc etc etc.... No end to this and eventually you will loose the battle. And irony is that they are selling their plan as COMPLETE PROTECTION PLAN and making fool of their customers.
Pathetic after sale support. It seems that Thomson and Flipcart are here to just increase their sales. No matter what happens to the product and the customer afterwards.
I will rate both Thomson TV and COMPLETE PROTECTION plan alongwith Flipcart negatively. DON'T BUY THIS..... ITS A TRAP

3. Sound quality is awesome.

Over and all, a product worth the money, better than MI, & can give a tough competition to LG, MI, Samsung and other brands.
